sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Time To Worry? Analysts Just Downgraded Their Nerdy, Inc. (NYSE:NRDY) Outlook
feed.summary: Analysts have downgraded Nerdy, Inc.'s outlook for next year, sharply cutting revenue estimates and increasing loss per share forecasts. The consensus price target also fell by 12% to US$1.79. The company's revenue growth is expected to slow significantly compared to historical performance and the wider industry.

feed.title: Nerdy, Inc. (NYSE:NRDY) Just Reported And Analysts Have Been Cutting Their Estimates
feed.summary: Nerdy, Inc. (NYSE:NRDY) recently reported third-quarter results, seeing its stock drop 13% after revenue fell short of analyst estimates, despite smaller-than-expected per-share losses. Analysts have since revised their financial models, significantly cutting revenue forecasts for 2026 and expecting increased losses per share, though the consensus price target remains largely unchanged. The company's projected annual revenue growth rate of 4.4% through 2026 is notably lower than its historical 10% rate and the 9.9% growth expected for the broader industry.

feed.title: Nerdy (NRDY) Expands K-12 Reach: Major Partnership Brings 24/7 Tutoring Platform to Entire School District
feed.summary: Parma City Schools has announced a partnership with Varsity Tutors for Schools, a Nerdy (NYSE: NRDY) company, to provide all district students with 24/7 access to live and on-demand tutoring resources. This comprehensive platform offers various academic tools, including chat tutoring, essay review, test prep, and personalized learning plans. The collaboration aims to support students, educators, and parents by bridging learning gaps and offering a safe, vetted learning experience.

feed.title: Online learning firm Nerdy expands with acquisition of edtech startup
feed.summary: Clayton-based online learning firm Nerdy has acquired Chicago-based edtech startup Codeverse to expand its educational offerings with coding programs for students. This move aims to enhance Nerdy's services by integrating specialized coding education.

feed.title: Todd Miltenberger Joins TMA Systems as Vice President of Finance & Corporate Development
feed.summary: TMA Systems announced the appointment of Todd Miltenberger as Vice President of Finance & Corporate Development. Miltenberger brings over 12 years of financial and corporate development experience, including executing the IPO of Nerdy, Inc (NYSE: NRDY). His appointment is a strategic move for TMA Systems to accelerate growth, expand internationally, and pursue future acquisitions.
